A list of biomes where the towers will n: A list of biomes where the towers will not spawn.
How rarely this tower type will spawn (l: How rarely this tower type will spawn (low: common, high: rare)
If the Waytones mod is installed and thi: If the Waytones mod is installed and this is set to true, towers will spawn with a waystone at the top. If the Waystone mod is not installed, this will have no effect.
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.towers_of: Adds tall towers in your world, inspired by The Legend Of Zelda: Breath Of The Wild.
